newsitem.title: JAPAN: JGBs end down on recoveries in Tokyo stocks,dollar.
newsitem.headline: JGBs end down on recoveries in Tokyo stocks,dollar.

text.p: *JGBs ended Tokyo weaker due to recoveries in Tokyo share
prices and U.S. dollar. *Selling of June JGBs for next
benchmark September was detected. *Activities of top four
Japanese brokerages were slow due to seasonal personnel
changes, adding to overall lacklustre trade.
